long_description: providing premium event crew hire services, crewsaders was founded on the principles of ‘breaking the mould’, so innovation is part of our heritage. our company values of professionalism, efficiency and respect have propelled our reputation as a premium crewing services supplier to event production companies throughout the uk and europe. we continue to drive the industry forward with exemplary standards in h&s practices, strict recruitment requirements, specialist skills training, thought leadership projects and collaborative industry partnerships. the strategic growth in our in-house technology has also enabled our real-time systems and processes to become more streamlined, efficient and resourceful.
